sense.gloss: to be used up, to be run out, to be exhausted, to be consumed, to come to an end
dragon's blood palm (Daemonorops draco), bright red resin used in medicine, dyes, etc.
the flame that burns twice as bright burns half as long, the well with sweet water will be the first to run dry
